properties.areaDesc: Bent County Including Las Animas; Prowers County Including Lamar; Kiowa County Including Eads
properties.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 2 at 4:22AM MST until February 2 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
...A Red Flag Warning is in effect today from Noon to 6PM MST for
gusty winds, low humidity and dry fuels, for fire weather zones
233, 234, 235, 236 and 237 which includes eastern Las Animas County,
Baca County, Bent County, Prowers County and Kiowa County...

The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag
Warning which is in effect from noon to 6 PM MST this evening.

* Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 234...235 and 236.

* Winds...South to southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30
mph.

* Relative Humidity...As low as 8 percent.

* Temperatures...In the lower 70s.

* Impacts...Conditions may be favorable for the rapid ignition,
growth and spread of fires.
properties.instruction:
A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions
are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of
strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can
contribute to extreme fire behavior.

NWSheadline: RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 234...235 AND 236
